name: Aman Real Estate Brokerage Company
description: Aman Real Estate Brokerage Company with a legacy of trust and excellence in Kuwaiti real estate. We offer a wide range of properties for rent, sale, and exchange, ensuring top-notch services for our clients.

ads.title: Spacious Apartment in Hawally
ads.description: A modern 3-bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms, a large living area, and a fully equipped kitchen. Located near shopping centers and schools.

ads.title: Luxury Villa for Sale in Salwa
ads.description: An exquisite 5-bedroom villa with private pool, landscaped garden, and high-end finishes. Ideal for a large family seeking comfort and luxury.

ads.title: Farm for Rent in Wafra
ads.description: Large farmhouse with vast agricultural land, perfect for farming or a quiet retreat. Fully equipped.

name: East Real Estate Company
description: East Real Estate Company is dedicated to providing affordable and quality housing solutions across Kuwait. Our portfolio includes a variety of apartments and commercial spaces.

ads.title: Commercial Shop for Rent in Salmiya
ads.description: Prime commercial shop located in a bustling area of Salmiya, suitable for retail or small businesses. High foot traffic.

name: Real Estate Office
description: Your trusted partner for all real estate needs. We provide comprehensive services for buying, selling, and renting properties.

ads.title: Studio for Exchange in Jabriya
ads.description: Cozy studio apartment, perfect for singles. Includes a compact kitchen and private bathroom. Looking to exchange for a 1-bedroom.

ads.title: Modern House for Rent in Jabriya
ads.description: Stylish 4-bedroom house with contemporary design and access to community amenities. Family-friendly neighborhood in Jabriya.

name: Real Estate Distance Company
description: Connecting you with properties across Kuwait, no matter the distance. Specializing in land sales and large-scale developments.

ads.title: Land for Sale in Hawally
ads.description: Large plot of land available for immediate development. Great investment opportunity in a developing area of Hawally.

ads.title: Building for Sale in Salmiya
ads.description: Entire residential building for sale in a prime Salmiya location. Includes 10 apartments and ground floor parking. Excellent for investors.

ads.title: Chalet for Exchange in Khiran
ads.description: Beachfront chalet with direct access to the sea, ideal for weekend getaways. Willing to exchange for a city apartment.
